revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Top Global |model=MB6000 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin=B000SBIJKE |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=09/15/2005 |manuf_country=China |manuf=Gemtek |manuf_model=WAPB-136G |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=3G hotspot |fcc_id=SUMMB6000 |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=4 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4712 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=TE28F640J3C-120 |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=GLT |ram1_model=GLT5640L16-6TC |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4712 |wi1_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip2_model=BCM2050 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=topglobalXXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^topglobal[0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=172.16.0.1 |default_user=public |default_pass=public |oui=00:0B:89 |oui_eth=00:0B:89 }} [http://www.topglobalusa.com/download/MB6000%20User%20Guide.pdf User's Guide]
There is a '''TI''' CardBus controller on-board.
The default SSID is '''topglobalXXXXXX''' where '''XXXXXX''' is the last 6 digits of the serial number.
==Resetting the device to factory defaults== After the unit has booted and is broadcasting an SSID, hold the '''RELOAD''' button for 20 seconds (until the front lights turn amber). After the lights turn amber, press the '''RESET''' button.
Holding the reset button for 10 seconds after the device turns on will wipe the firmware on the device (it will require a reload via TFTP).
